title: Wild-looking Ryuger Eidolon Covid eBike is a full suspension carbonâ€¦ commuter?
content: Dear me, there’s a lot to unpack here. Australian brand Ryuger have announced that their latest wild-looking creation is about to go into production. Meet the Ryuger Eidolon BR-RTS, a full carbon, full suspension, aero commuter ebike. We’ve never seen anything quite like it… Why do they call it their Covid eBike? Simply because they […]
author: Jessie-May Morgan
